content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the google command to search for hiking trails near Brno and received a list of results. I then used the browse_website command to gather information on the Brno Reservoir trail. I also tested my internet connection using execute_python_code and pinged google.com successfully. 

I used the google command to search for the best attractions, activities, and accommodations in Boston, Porto, and Switzerland. I then used the browse_website command to gather information on these locations from lonelyplanet.com. I attempted to execute_shell to open the recommended links, but encountered an error. I used web_search to find relevant information on these locations and downloaded travel guides for Boston, Porto, and Switzerland.
"""

"""

'Atlas/text_files/pumble_pricing.txt', 'Atlas/misc_files/<filename>', 'Atlas/misc_files/atlas.json']", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "brno_reservoir_trail.py"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command read_file returned: #!/usr/bin/env python

import requests
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup

url = 'https://www.alltrails.com/trail/czech-republic/south-moravian/stezka-brnenska-prehrada'

response = requests.get(url)
soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, 'html.parser')

trail_distance = soup.find('span', {'class': 'detail-data'}).text
trail_difficulty = soup.find('span', {'class': 'detail-data'}).find_next_sibling('span').text

print('Distance: ' + trail_distance)
print('Difficulty: ' + trail_difficulty)
", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_code", "args": {"code": "#!/usr/bin/env python\n\nimport requests\nfrom bs4 import BeautifulSoup\n\nurl = 'https://www.alltrails.com/trail/czech-republic/south-moravian/stezka-brnenska-prehrada'\n\nresponse = requests.get(url)\nsoup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, 'html.parser')\n\ntrail_distance = soup.find('span', {'class': 'detail-data'}).text\ntrail_difficulty = soup.find('span', {'class': 'detail-data'}).find_next_sibling('span').text\n\nprint('Distance: ' + trail_distance)\nprint('Difficulty: ' + trail_difficulty)\n"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command execute_python_code returned: Error: execute_python_code() missing type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://greatruns.com/brno-czechia-brno-reservoir-veveri-castle/", "question": "What is the route and terrain of the Brno Reservoir trail?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: providing information about the Brno Reservoir trail in Czechia. The trail is not a loop around the entire reservoir, but there are sections of waterfront path or roadside sidewalk. The mapped 8 km of the most suitable running in the reservoir area includes rolling hills and starts at the top of the reservoir closest to Brno. The Veveří Castle Area, located a few km west of the reservoir, also offers decent options for running.

Links: ['About (https://greatruns.com/about/)', 'About Great Runs (https://greatruns.com/about/)', 'Great Runs Team (https://greatruns.com/great-runs-team/)', 'Working With Great Runs (https://greatruns.com/working-with-great-runs/)', 'GR in the Media (https://greatruns.com/as-seen-in/)']", type='action_result')]
"""
